sentences.en: A little adolescent rebellion is commonly believed to be healthy.
sentences.cn: 大家一致认为，青少年有点叛逆是正常的。

sentences.en: Give yourself a healthy glow on our detox diet.
sentences.cn: 我们的解毒食谱将会让您容光焕发。

sentences.en: Going veggie can be tasty, easy and healthy too.
sentences.cn: 吃素也可以吃得很可口，烹饪也容易，并且有益健康。

sentences.en: He predicts a continuation of healthy profits in the current financial year.
sentences.cn: 他预计本财年能继续保持可观的利润。

sentences.en: Her mother was a dedicated apostle of healthy eating.
sentences.cn: 她母亲是健康饮食矢志不渝的倡导者。

sentences.en: I’ve always been perfectly healthy until now.
sentences.cn: 直到现在，我的身体一直非常健康。

sentences.en: Kiwi fruit are just the thing for a healthy snack.
sentences.cn: 猕猴桃正是健康的小点心。

sentences.en: My department had a healthy interest in keeping expenses down.
sentences.cn: 我部门对维持低水平开支有浓厚兴趣。

sentences.en: She was born with a healthy dose of self-confidence.
The doctor's verdict was that he was entirely healthy.
sentences.cn: 医生的结论是他完全健康。

sentences.en: The film opened to healthy box office receipts before rapidly falling off.
sentences.cn: 这部影片的票房收入开始的时候持续上涨，但是后来急剧下降。

sentences.en: The healthy trade figures mask a much gloomier picture.
sentences.cn: 繁荣的贸易数据背后掩盖着贸易极不景气的真相。

sentences.en: The moisturiser gave my face a healthy glow that lasted all day.
sentences.cn: 涂了润肤霜，我的脸一整天都红润亮泽。

sentences.en: The technique consists of injecting healthy cells into the weakened muscles.
sentences.cn: 该技术是把健康细胞注射到衰弱的肌肉里面。

sentences.en: Their healthy image disguises the fact that they are highly processed foods.
sentences.cn: 它们看上去有益健康，实则掩盖了其为精加工食品这一事实。

sentences.en: Was it just a temporary blip on an otherwise healthy growth curve?
sentences.cn: 这是否是原本良好的增长曲线中暂时的偏离？

words.tran_cn: 健康的；有益健康的；卫生的
医疗保健；健康护理，健康服务；卫生保健

trans.tran_cn: 健康的，健全的，大量的，有益于健康的
trans.tran_en: physically strong and not likely to become ill or weak
physically strong and not likely to become ill or weak
